title: Need Help Identifying Typeface
content:
Can anyone help identify thie typeface used for the SnaFooz logo?

Is it custom?  
I've found similar typefaces like ITC Blaze, etc. But no exact matches.

Anyone know?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820192628im_/http:/typophile.com/files/snafooz-74310427_6498.jpg)
author: jlynch6

comments.content:
> Need Help Identifying Typeface

Ah. Then you should have gone to the Type ID forum, where experts await you.

[http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820192628/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

Here (General Discussion), if you read the forum description, it says:

All topics are welcome— **except font ID requests**.

That means your question is unwelcome.
